name: Laptop
description: Powerful laptop with a quad-core i5 processor, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD, and a 14-inch FHD display.

name: Smartphone
description: A sleek smartphone with a 6.5-inch OLED display, 128GB storage, and a 48MP camera.

name: Wireless Headphones
description: Noise-canceling wireless headphones with 30-hour battery life and deep bass sound.

name: Gaming Monitor
description: 27-inch QHD gaming monitor with 165Hz refresh rate, 1ms response time, and HDR support.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: RGB mechanical keyboard with hot-swappable switches and customizable macros.

name: Smartwatch
description: Feature-packed smartwatch with heart rate tracking, GPS, and a 7-day battery life.
